ActPatent Act
Trademarks Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Patent Rules and the Trade-marks Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRADE-MARKS REGULATIONS in order to address housekeeping issues that have been identified with Canadaâ€™s IP regime. The amendments would ensure consistency between the powers laid out in the Patent Act and the practices of the Office are enshrined in the regulations. This would satisfy the concerns raised by the Committee, and provide legal certainty by ensuring that all sections of the Patent Rules have statutory authority.
